summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 3.8°C) and feels like temperature (down 1.9°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 13%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 12234 lux) and cloud levels (up 350 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 15613 lux), the amount of wind (up 21 miles), cloud levels (up 548 m), and outside temperature (up 3.4°C) when compared to today.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 292m to a maximum of 1476m, averaging 412.5m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 960.4m and 888.4m respectively.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; mild temperatures are expected. Also, neither too dry nor too humid and gentle light winds are expected. Drizzle or light rain possible, the sky will be mostly cloudy (or even foggy) with low clouds, and low sunlight due to cloudy or overcast skies. Changeable conditions.
